body.p: Spin buttons are two arrows, one to increase a value and one to decrease a value. Spin buttons are not used as separate elements, but are used in combination with other elements to create a control that can be increased and decreased.
For instance, spinbuttons are used for the number type template.XULElem("textbox"), and with the template.XULElem("timepicker") and template.XULElem("datepicker").
